mapper.select: select save_file_name, original_file_name, file_size, file_extention, path from attached_file where no = #{no} and use_ox = 'O'
mapper.update: update attached_file set original_file_name=#{originalFileName}, save_file_name=#{saveFileName}, file_size=#{fileSize}, file_extention=#{fileExtention}, ip =#{ip}, modification_date=sysdate() where no=#{no}
